name: f5cloudstatus-mcp
description: MCP server for F5 Cloud Status monitoring
long_description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for monitoring F5 Cloud service status, providing real-time status information, component health, incidents, and scheduled maintenance.

tools.name: f5-status-get-overall
tools.description: Get the current overall status of F5 Cloud services.

tools.name: f5-status-get-components
tools.description: Get all service components with current status.

tools.name: f5-status-get-component
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific component.

tools.name: f5-status-search
tools.description: Search for components, incidents, or maintenance by keyword.
